SELECT t.oper_id, t.oper_modul, t.oper_type, t.oper_desc, t.oper_requ_param, t.oper_resp_param, t.oper_user_id, t.oper_user_name, t.oper_method, t.oper_uri, t.oper_ip, DATE_FORMAT(t.oper_create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') oper_create_time, t.oper_ver FROM operation_log t
t.oper_user_name LIKE concat('%',#{operUserName},'%')
and (t.oper_modul LIKE concat('%',#{typeOrModul},'%') or t.oper_type LIKE concat('%',#{typeOrModul},'%'))
and t.oper_create_time >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and t.oper_create_time <= STR_TO_DATE(concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
order by t.oper_create_time desc
